name: Lisa Miller
message: I did find Wave confusing, but the first time I started to work with it I understood that "Oh-oh-oh!  This is how people REALLY communicate!"  I've been excited ever since. Now email seems really antiquated and clunky, but we'll be using it for a long time to come. It would be most helpful to just walk into it, realizing it's not like anything else.  Read a few tutorials and start a wave.
